title: Sound Opinions Show
teaser: Hosts Jim DeRogatis and Greg Kot get grisly with their favorite Murder Ballads for Halloween.
description:
FEATURE:

Halloween is just around the corner, and hosts Jim DeRogatis and Greg Kot are feeling a bit morbid. They each play songs about getting whacked, sleeping with the fishes, and being offed. In other words: murder. Selections include songs by the Violent Femmes, Iron Maiden and Neil Young. They also take calls from listeners in Oswego, NY; Chicago, IL; Raleigh, NC; and Bordentown, NJ to hear their favorite Murder Songs. 

REVIEW:

Jim and Greg review Lightning Bolt, the tenth album from Gen-X rockers Pearl Jam.

YOUR SOUND OPINIONS
 
At the end of the show we hear comments from listeners.
